import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p.id === productId); return( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} Status: ${product.countInStock >0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
